3: The chaotic barrage of cannon fire finally comes to a halt, and Karenina's frame softly collapses on her weapon. Her fingertips still twirling with a halo of energy in pale violet.
Commandant, Karenina's M.I.N.D. will need to be manually rebooted.
Wait, if we don't solve her issue before rebooting, it'll all just be the same as before.
Understood... That strange light seething out of her—how should we deal with it?
It looks like some form of energy.
Don't touch it! I accessed Karenina's logs... She met Kamui.
Her M.I.N.D. went into an infinite loop in the middle of the fight.
From the visual image extracted from the logs... this command function is visual imagery saving, she must have saved something in an emergency...
(Liv manipulates the glowing particles in the air into an image.)
(In the image, a purplish fluid-like something is attached to Kamui's weapon and his left shoulder.)
Kamui must have left us for this...
No, he's still on the move. If this is the 'last resort,' then he'll already have returned to you.
I'll try, there's no other way.
